experiment_title: Illumina HiSeq 4000 sequencing; SARS-CoV-2-specific IgA and limited inflammatory cytokines are present in the stool of select patients with acute COVID-19
study_title: human stool Metagenome from acute COVID19+ subjects
sample_title: This sample has been submitted by pda|jeremiahfaith on 2020-10-20; gut metagenome
experiment_title_specific: Illumina HiSeq 4000 paired end sequencing; SARS-CoV-2-specific IgA and limited inflammatory cytokines are present in the stool of select patients with acute COVID-19
experiment_design_description: DNA (extracted as for 16S rRNA amplicon sequencing) was sonicated and Illumina sequencing libraries generated using the NEBNext Ultra II DNA Library Prep Kit. Ligation products of 500 600 base pairs were purified using SPRIselect beads (Beckman Coulter) and enrichment PCR performed. Samples were pooled in equal proportions and size-selected using AMPure XP beads (Beckman Coulter) before sequencing with an Illumina HiSeq (paired-end 150 bp).
